111.content:
The beautiful (and cute) vixen, renamon. you have always fancied her and wanted to meet her in real life. when she appeared in your town and only just across the road from you...
your mind says go over to her but your legs won't allow you to, then she notice's that your wondering eyes have peared over her body. your adrenaline takes over you, you hear your heart pounding with every beat at this precise moment it seemed like an Eternity.

suddenly.....

1111.content:
as renamon walks over to you, you try to think of something to say, when suddenly renamon jumps up in the air above you and begins charging her diamond storm attack. panicking you duck down to the ground, you start to think it's all over when you hear a roar from behind you. you turn to see a rogue digimon behind that was about to attack you. quickly, renamon unleashes her attack on the rogue digimon destorying it. you turn over panting slightly and thanking god that you survived.

'are you okay?' you hear a voice say from behind you, you jump and turn around to see it's renamon who is talking to you. 'i'm fine, thank you so much for saving me' you reply.
'no problem'
Please, let me thank you properly over dinner'
Renamon....

Wait..She is not growing but you are shrinking! You see everything around you starts to get bigger in your view and that Renamon seems to notice too as you were getting smaller and smaller. You don't know why all of suddenly you are getting small but hopefully the shrinking will stop soon enough...

How small are you to Renamon?

112.content:
...gatomon

you have always liked gatomon for some reason, so when you see her at the park...
your heart starts to beat faster, your breathing becomes heavier, you begin to sweat and time almost comes to a stop.

you watch her every step as she walks past you, you swear that you see her turn her head around and wink at you. before you can talk to her she suddenly runs off in the opposite direction.

do you.....

1121.content: You follow Gatomon into a deserted portion of the park that you've never been to before. She slows down and turns around to face you.
1121.title: follow her

choices: "Go on ahead and reserve a table for us. I'll just be a moment!"
11212.content:
"Well?" She says with her paws on her hips and a playful smirk on her face. "I know you do. I caught you staring at me, and personally I don't mind it," she continues with a wink.

"Ummm..." is all you can say. This little cat is sure getting you all hot and bothered!

Gatomon rolls her eyes and speaks again, "I WAS going to invite you to coffee with me, but if you'd rather just stand there and drool..."

She turns and begins to walk away, swinging her hips slowly as she goes.

"W-wait!" you shout back at her, "I'd love to go for coffee with you!"

"I knew you'd come around, Cutie Pie!" she replies in a sultry tone,
11212.title: "Like what you see, Cutie Pie?"

1123.content: You see everything around you get bigger. You realise you shrunk down at...
1123.title: you suddenly shrink and she comes back

choices: She walks toward a bench... and her tail knocks you skyward!
She sits down in the grass... right where you now stand!
11233.content:
Looking around you, you see grass blades the size of skyscrapers! Dirt the size of boulders! You're just a mere speck now!

Suddenly...
Earthquakes!
No...
FOOTSTEPS!
BEHIND YOU!
They stop...

You slowly turn around and gape in awe...
Gatomon is looming right over you! She was only about 2 feet tall a moment ago! Now she's as big as a city! You could see every hair on her paws! They were thicker than you were tall!

Gatomon's voice booms high above you...
"Hmmm... I wonder where that cute human boy went... *giggle* I was going to strut my stuff for him!"

The titanic Gatomon above you puts her paws on her hips and strikes a pose, mimicking what she would do if you were around. But you WERE around! You were right in front of her! You were just too insignificant to be seen by this enormous white goddess!

"Oh well," she says, beginning to walk forward. You gaze up in astonishment as her massive paw lifts from the ground. It sails in a graceful arc, and you watch it loom high above of you, then descend downward with a great force what seems like miles away! Her other paw follows suit, and arcs over you as well, and the amazing feat repeats itself again! The furry colossus takes but only two steps and has already covered what would have taken you a day to travel! Her gargantuan tail descends to the ground right beside you! The force of her tail gently hitting the ground sends you flying into a blade of grass! If this grass wasn't here, you would have gone even further!
She had stopped walking, and was thinking of what to do.
You regain your composure and look up at your goddess again. She was still just as awe-inspiring from the back! The cute little backside you had admired from afar now filled your sky!
Your colossus speaks again...
"I wonder if he's coming back... *giggle* I sure hope so! I should never have let him out of my sight!"
You are amazed that such a wondrous, gigantic being could have a thing for you! Of all people! It's a shame that you're far too tiny to take her up on her offer!
"I guess I can sit and wait for a bit... *giggle* maybe he's watching me right now!"

If only this titan knew just how correct she was...
11233.title: Microscopic

choices: You're on her palm and she founds you!
You're somewhere on Gatomon and lost in her white fur forest!

You watch the gigantic cat goddess digimon turning toward the bench, you saw her tail coming rights at you and you just remain where you are, because this is no way you can dodge that you're too minuscule and powerless for avoiding dangers. As the tail knocks you up, you're sending fly into the skyward very fast cause you to black out and you fall right on Gatomon!

Later... you wake-up hoping it's just a dream but no it's real. You were amazed that's you're still alive but where are you now? Looking around of you, you are...

A: You found yourself on a strange yellow landscape and an blue skyscraper eye is looking right on you! You realize you are on Gatomon's palm and she somehow founds you!

B: You found yourself in a strange white forest, everything look white and you realize you are somewhere on Gatomon and you don't know where you are on her... you're lost anyway... what you doing to do now?

1123311.content:
You looked around your surroundings at first when you wake up and you see a landscape of yellow the stretch out for miles and then you looked up in the sky to see white fuzzy clouds and two orbs of blue moon....Wait a minute, you remember that the tail knock of gatomon had knock you up and that it looks like you were now on the palms of the gigantic cat of Gatomon. You don't know how you feel about being so tiny compare to her and that she is looking right at you with a smile though.

"There you are and it looks like you are awake my cutie pie. I hope you had a great nap!" Her voice booms over your tiny body and that you felt like your ears would pop but lucky it didn't though. It seems like she was trying to whisper to you but due to your tiny size, it sounds like she was talking in normal voice but louder than you think. You try to regain your composure and stand up to her and reply, but her voice came again to you before you reply back.

" I am glad that I have found you and that I was just sitting on the bench waiting for you to come back but lucky, I saw something very small past my face and that I held up my hand towards you. I thought it was a dust until I looked closer and see a tiny human. I don't know how you got so small but I think you are really cute at this size". Her voice booms again with her words and that you felt like you weren't going to take it all in but lucky you do. It was a good thing she had found you before you flew past her or anything. Who knows were you were going to land on.

As you get back up, you tried to reply to her that you don't know how you've got so small either or anything but you were lucky that you been found by her at the same time. Also, you mention that she is gorgeous at her height and that you wanted to date her once you got back to your regular size. You wave your arms hoping she see you trying to shout and reply. At the end of your speech, She...

choices: "I will try to find a way to fix you." (She going to help you.)

11233111.content:
You yell all you can at the gigantic white cat goddess Gatomon but it seems your voice can't make up as you get cut by her boom voice.

"I'm sorry little guy but I can't hear you. Hold on, I'm going to bring you to one of my ears." She turns her head and move carefully her paw close to her ear. "Okay, say something." Her voice booms again as she's really listen you hoping she can hear you.

"CAN YOU HEAR ME, NOW?!?!" You yell all you can again at the giga cave sized ear of Gatomon. But you get no response as you notice she's still waiting for your word. After 1 minute of waiting, she moves her planet size head away and shake, then looks back at you with a sad look that you can barely notice this by looking one of her eyes.

"I'm afraid, I still can't hear you..." Her voice booms again, you don't know what to do or neither how long you going be able endure her very loud voice at this size, because even if she whispers, her voice still hurts your poor ears.

Then Gatomon smiles and continues... "Don't worry my minuscule cutie pie..."

112331112.content:
"Don't worry my minuscule cutie pie, I will take really good care of you." she says with a goddess voice over you again and that you couldn't believe that she is going to keep you of this size and that not help you find a way back to normal size.. You were happy and scared at the same time. You were happy because you got a goddess watching over you and that she is willing to take good care of you even though she is pretty hot at this size. At the same time, you were also scared that at being this size, she might lose you somewhere and that it'll be hard to get her attention from your size. You wonder if she is going to keep you a safe place so she can have an eye on you and be easy for her to see you.

As you were keep thinking this for a moment, Your goddess speaks again with her huge voice and that you don't know how you will get used to her voice if you are going to be kept like this.

"Well cutie, it looks like I am going to take you home now and that we can play some few games of mine. I do admired you at this size and that I am finally able to keep a tiny pet human like you." She says with a cheerful voice.

You wave your hands up and down screaming about it and that she should help you find a way to bring you back to size. Gatomon thinks for a moment before she decided to

"I am going to keep you on my hand paw so I can spot you easily little guy and that I should hold you very nice while walking. No need to lose you somewhere on my body and can't find you at all. Now hold on tight, my lovely tiny cutie pie and enjoy the scene while I'll walked home." With that, she carries you with her hand paw that you were sitting on and that her view of her face moved away from you as she looks ahead and walked out with her hand paw sticking out forward. Not only she did that, she move her fingers curled up overhead so that you wouldn't fly out on the speed of her massive walk. You could barely see the view on the outside world but you know where she was going anyway.

Thoom! Thoom! Thoom!

Each step she takes, creates huge earthquake to as well as she is making progress to her home. Even the simplest step, is knocking the lights out of you and that you really just top tiny to even balance yourself on the landscape of her palm. You just thought maybe sitting down and getting some sleep would be a good idea as the feline just keeps walking.

As this continues for about 30 minutes, You felt the tremors had stop and that you were waken up by your goddess again as she peaks in to her hand to see you sleeping on the palm.

"Wake up cutie pie, we are home!" She says louder than before as she sounds excited to show you, your new home you are going to be staying at with her and that you could see her home is like exactly the ones back at home (you are in digital world). As you looked to survey every view of the house, she move her hand to one side to another giving you a tour of her home. As she finished moving her hand around the house, she moved it back to her gargantuan face and that she is looking at you with one eye to see if you are liking the place already.

"Well tiny guy, what do you think of my place?" she says again louder and that you thought you ears would burst from excitement again but didn't.

"I think it looks great Gatomon and thank you for the grand tour!" You said even though she can't hear you at all. So you made an happy expression and rub her massive landscape paw that you approved of it. Gatomon sees this and that she begins to purred that you love it already.

113.content: You meet Biyomon the cute pink bird, when suddenly you start to shrink down right in front of her, in few seconds you now smaller than her and you were now at size of...
113.title: biyomon

choices: The size of a grain of sand!
114.content:
You see a Palmon talking to an ice cream vendor. You've seen her around before, and always thought she was kind of cute. She was always helping kids get kites out of tree, or helping to find lost dogs. You sit on a bench to rest and decide to watch her for a few minutes. She seems to look very sad, and then walks away from the vendor. She comes up to the bench and sits down beside you, looking rather gloomy.
"What's wrong?" you ask, trying to be polite.
"Oh... it's nothing..." she says, "I just wanted to buy an ice cream, but I don't have enough money..."
You reach into your pocket and pull out some money. "Here," you say, "go get yourself an ice cream."
"Oh!" she exclaimed, "You don't have to do that!"
"I insist," you say with a smile. Palmon awkwardly smiles back and takes your money. She thanks you, and runs off to get her ice cream. Doing something nice like that gives you a nice warm feeling inside...
Wait...
This is a strange feeling...
Why... why is everything getting bigger...
...and bigger...
...and BIGGER?!

You had shrunk! How could this happen?! What's more, you see Palmon coming back with her ice cream! You need to get her attention!
When Palmon gets back to the bench, she looks around, confused.
"Where did that nice human boy go? I wanted to thank him again..."

She was HUGE!
But how big was she, or more importantly, how small are you?
114.title: Palmon

choices: Palmon grabs you before you fall!
1141.content:
Palmon looks down and gasps!
"M... Mister Human? Wha... What happened to you?!" she asks, frightened.
You, however are much more frightened than she is! Any notion of getting her attention has left you. now that you see her up close, she's terrifying! You take off running as fast as you can!
"Mister Human! Wait! I don't want to hurt you! I only want to help you!"
You are in no mood to listen. You reach the edge of the bench and prepare to drop down and make your escape.
All logic has left you at this point.
1141.title: The size of a mouse!

choices: Palmon asks someone nearby for help.
She gently picks you up and takes you home.
11412.content:
You hit the ground much harder than expected, and at an awkward angle. This causes your ankle to become twisted! With a yelp of pain, you collapse to the ground.

Palmon has no idea what to do! She has just seen the now-diminutive human jump off the bench and start to yell!

"Are you... are you hurt, Mister?" she asks, as calm as she can muster. The Quiet whimpering from below answers her question. She bends down to get a closer look, but that doesn't sit well with you at all. You try to scramble to your feet and escape, but end up falling back down in pain once more. Palmon has seen enough, and knows that you need help, fast!
11412.title: You fall and hurt yourself!

choices: You don't make it in time and Palmon crushes you.
1142.content:
When you see Palmon from your point of view, you now realize that you have shrunken to the size of an ant, about 1/8 of an inch tall. From down here, Palmon looks like a big hulking monster and terrifies you to no end. You try shouting to Palmon to get here attention. "HEY! PALMON! LOOK DOWN! I'M DOWN HERE ON THE BENCH! HELP ME!" But it doesn't work. You're so minuscule that Palmon can't hear your cries for help.

"I wonder where that nice human boy went. Maybe he had somewhere to be right now?" Palmon said as she still couldn't see you. Even when her eyes looked down on the bench she just couldn't notice your tiny form on the wooden area you were shouting and jumping on.

You were still trying to get the gigantic plant beast's attention with no success. Eventually you were too tired and ran out of breath as you realized it was hopeless. "Oh well, it was still nice of him to give me his money to buy my ice cream. Thank you Mister Human." She said to you as if you were still sitting in front of her at your normal size.

Palmon was about to sit down on the bench right on the spot where you were standing. You could a shadow cast over you as you looked up in horror as you saw Palmon's gigantic rear end descending upon you just waiting to crush you. With all your energy you tried to run out of the way as her humongous butt was coming down on you. Did you make it out of the way in time or were you too late and got crushed as Palmon sat on you?
1142.title: The size of an ant!

1211.content:
I'm not sure but I can offer few choices.

1. We choose digitestined partner digimons like Palmon, Biyomon or (!SPOILER WARNING!) Gatomon (Tailmon). They seem, sound and look female.

2. Or other digitestined digimon like Agumon, Patamon, Gomamon, Tentomon, Gabumon and Agumon whom seem like male digimon

3. Or we choose Agumon, Patamon, Gomamon, Tentomon, Gabumon or Agumon and give one of them feminine traits eyelashes, female voice, body, butt, boobs, mons veneris etc.


Option 2. and option 3. feels to me to far-fetched but if we are p-r-e-c-i-s-e digimons don't have a gender. They are a data and the data doesn't have gender. (According to Renamon from Digimon Tamers). Though we have digimons who looks like very feminine (for example Ranamon, Harpymon, Kazemon, Sakuyamon etc.) and have name that indicates female digimon for example Ladydevimon and Angewomon.

(The original author/writer can change or delete this chapter if he/she wants)

Then again this is a fan story so you can write and choose what ever you want!

15221.content: You wake up to find yourself in a forest. The trees were bigger than what You were use to, and when you turn your head, you see a rock that is about 3 times bigger than you are. "What the, why is everything So big, am I small?" You ask yourself. Before any more thoughts could cross your mind, you felt footstep that were approching to your destination. What was approaching you was...
15221.title: Digidestend Digimon.

152211.content:
What you saw was a blue look dino- creature, whatever it was. It looked like it didn't know you were on the grass. "I need to move." You muttered and instantly got up and was about to run away from the giant creature.

You ran for a short while. That is, until you noticed younwere running slower than usual. "What the?" You said as the Veemon was catching up by just simply walking. "Oh no oh no oh no!" You muttered that as younwere still trying to run, but...
152211.title: Veemon

15231.title: Digimon Tamers

152311.content: Okay, let's start with the main guys :3
152311.title: Digidestined Digimon

choices: they meet a digimon on the way
1523111.content:
it was a quiet night in shinjuku city, meaning that guilmon could sleep peacefully in the park

or he would have, if a certain imp digimon would stop bothering him and complaining that he was bored, guilmon tried to ignore him

Come on you lazy dino, if you come out and play games with me, we can make this boring night interesting

uuugh, can't you go bother renamon, she'll probably play with you

she.....threatened to use her diamond storm on me if i bothered her again

guilmon rolled his eyes, lying on the ground with his head on his arms

even if i wanted to, what would we do? not like i can do anything to make things less boring

oh contraire, my lizard friend, it just so happens that i know about a cool glowing thing in the park gardens, but some stupid humans locked the gates to it, if you used your big muscles to open the gates, we can check it out

guilmon didn't really care about the glowing thing, and he certainly didn't want to break anything like the gates, he turned away from impmon

AW COME ON

Impmon was starting to get annoyed, pacing around before he got struck by an mischievous idea

fine, i'll just sneak inside and eat all the treats i saw there myself

TREATS!!!

guilmon rushed to the den opening, causing impmon to fall backwards, surprised his lie worked so well, grinning he got up and dusted himself off, looking at the eager dino

didn't i mention the treats the humans left there? guess it slipped my mind

without asking, impmon leaped up onto guilmon's back, sitting in a riding position

we get there fast, we can eat all of them ourselves

without further encouragement, guilmon runs towards the gardens
1523111.title: little red lizard

1523331.title: Digimon Universe: App Monsters (Season 7)

info.brief_description: digimon girls and boys become macros and micros
info.description:
Note: this interactive is currently being reworked, going slow due to writing.com's membership restrictions

all the digimon girls and boys become macro

You play yourself in the world of digimon, witness to them becoming titans before you. Wether it's because they grow or you shrink is up to you

rules:
No.1: you are the main character in this story
No.2: no deaths, period
No.3: inflation or weight gain are acceptable, so long as they grow to macro size as well
No.4: you can shrink or the digi characters can grow
No.5: you are indestructable, so, yes you can have vore but no scat.
No.6: all the characters are 18+, NO EXCEPTIONS

(there was a little mix up with the chapters, i accidentally put digidestains in the wrong chapter. to TakeruDavis: i moved the chapters u wrote to the 3rd option at the beginning)

edit: not many people are adding so i've made a few changes. stomping is now allowed.
